attributes.action: Propose "Extreme Ironing" as an olympic sport for London 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This alternative sport combines the thrills of an extreme outdoor activity with the satisfaction of a well pressed shirt. It was invented in Leicester in 1997 and is a British phenomenon - steaming ahead worldwide.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
